name: FTransform3d
doc:
Transform composed of Quat/Translation/Scale.
@note This is implemented in either TransformVectorized.h or TransformNonVectorized.h depending on the platform.

Rotation: Rotation of this transformation, as a quaternion.
Translation: Translation of this transformation, as a vector.
Scale3D: 3D scale (always applied in local space) as a vector.
